description: Name of the maintenance workgroup within the fleet organization that the user/labor record is associated with.
Username or employee ID of the technician or staff member associated with this labor record, often including a business-unit prefix.
User or system that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
User who last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the record.
Full display name of the associated user; likely sourced from identity or HR systems; confirm with SME.
Identifies the inspector for the work or flags that the user holds an inspector role; exact usage may vary; confirm with SME.
